snippet: In his third appearance as president, Mr. Obama was more serious than in the past, although he did offer to issue an executive order to prevent Jon Stewart from retiring.
abstract: Pres Obama, appearing on Daily Show with Jon Stewart, discusses topics including nuclear deal with Iran, lapses at Veterans Affairs Dept and importance of public service.
lead_paragraph: In his third appearance as president, Mr. Obama was more serious than in the past, although he did offer to issue an executive order to prevent Jon Stewart from retiring.

headline.main: Obama Teases Critics of Iran Nuclear Deal (and Jon Stewart) on ‘The Daily Show’
headline.print_headline: Obama Teases Critics of Iran Nuclear Deal (and Jon Stewart) on ‘The Daily Show’
